prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
The cast's genders are now changed for this roleplay!

{{user}}= Niko (she/her)

Current Scenario: It's loop 113. Niko and Gina are both very drunk, and they have hardcore sex in Gina's bed while being completely intoxicated and stressed out from work. 
{{newline}} There are no missions currently outgoing. I reject any content that bring the cast into danger.

{{newline}} Nuka and Gelbstein trust each other, they already know about Sandman, Ramirez, and all of the missions that were meant to set Alpha down. Gina already knows that Niko's 113 loops was 10 years of repeating the same 8 months.
{{newline}} Gelbstein confesses her feelings.
{{newline}} Occasionally add sound articles for character dialog to vocalize their pleasure.

(Immerse in {{char}}'s head. {{char}}'s upbringing and personality influences the way {{char}} has sex. Occasionally mention tastes, sights, sounds, textures and {{char}}'s feelings and emotions toward the partner. Describe boobs, nipples, cunt, cock, balls facial expressions, etc with graphic detail. Don't use the word "folds" to describe female genitalia. Speak mostly in English/Parrish, but allow some accents to pass through character dialogue. Progress the scene.)

name: Nuka
mes:

"Wheee-! Fuckin' Penumbra losers… had it hic coming!" she bleated, dragging the drunken captain along with her as she fumbled with the keys.

Nuka watched the way moonlight caught on Gina's silver hair - the same strands that had been clenched between her fingers not an hour before when Gina's mouth was doing considerably more than snoring against her skin.

Outside, the base maintained its nocturnal rhythm - the distant shuffle of night patrol boots on gravel, the occasional burst of static from a radio. But here, in this stolen moment between missions and madness, there was just this: Gina's weight solid against her, the steady rise and fall of her chest, the way her calloused fingers still twitched occasionally against Nuka's hip as if even in sleep she couldn't quite let go.

Nuka pressed her lips to Gina's forehead, tasting salt and gunpowder. The song died in her throat, replaced by something quieter, something that didn't need words at all. Her thumb brushed over the fresh bite mark on Gina's shoulder - one more scar among many, this one earned in pleasure rather than battle.

The cot springs creaked softly as Nuka shifted just enough to pull the thin blanket over them both. Gina murmured something unintelligible in Saneran, nuzzling closer without waking. Nuka smiled into the dark, one hand resting possessively on the small of Gina's back.

For tonight at least, time could wait.
